TO ALL MEMBERS OF THE NAEB TRANSCRIPTION NETWORK:
HEREWITH IS THE REVISED PROGRAM SCHEDULE FOR SERIES I -
"WS HUMAN BEINGS”•
KAY WE TAKE THIS OPPORTUNITY TO REMIND YOU THAT IT IS
ESSENTIAL THAT THE REPORT SHEETS WHICH WERE SENT TO YOU
BE RETURNED IMMEDIATELY AFTER EACH BROADCAST.
SEYMOUR N. SIEGEL
CO-ORDINATOR
